transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello. Haan. 
Executive: Uh, yes sir, Rehan ji baat kar rahe the?
Customer: Haan boliye madam.
Executive: Ye 23rd November ko aapka ek concern aaya tha sir, leads ke regarding isliye connect kiya maine.
Customer: Kis ke liye?
Executive: Bhai leads ke regarding kiya madam aaj ki.
Customer: Haan. Boliye kya tha.
Executive: Uh, yaha pe aaya tha matlab aapne kisi ko call kiya tha 132 wale number pe?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji, toh uh, matlab kya problem aati hai aapko?
Customer: Madam aap jo buyleads de rahe ho na.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Unme se 70% ye de rahe hai hume chahiye hi nahi.
Executive: Unko requirement nahi hai?
Customer: Haan, aur 30% ye bol rahe hai ki humne le li.
Customer: Ye aa rahi hai bhi problem toh buyleads ke liye main isliye maine complete kisi ko buyleads achi diya aap.
Executive: Ji. Ye problem aapko matlab jaise ki aapko kuch direct calls aate hai aur kuch inquiry bhi post hoti hai aapke lead manager mein message ke form mein. Unme bhi ye problem aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan. Haan, kyuki wo Makrana ki aa rahi hai, wo unpe bhi aa rahi hai wo, wo jo inquiry aa rahi hai na wo Makrana ki aa rahi hai ji.
Executive: Makrana ke alawa kahi aur koi aur ki nahi aa rahi?
Customer: Nahi madam nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Uh, matlab percentage kam hoga but kisi aur ki bhi toh aayi hogi na, ek, do, teen matlab.
Customer: Kya keh rahe ho?
Executive: Main ye bol rahi hu percentage kam hoga par aayi toh hongi Makrana ke alawa bhi aur koi.
Customer: Nahi nahi maine toh nahi dekhi. Abhi tak toh dekhi nahi. Toh aap karoge buyleads ka kuch.
Executive: Aap akele hi manage kar rahe ho na isko?
Customer: Nahi friend hai.
Executive: Friend hai. Uh. Ek minute. All India ka kar rahe ho na aap toh?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Classic Marble Enterprises.
Executive: Makrana ki toh aapne elective kar rakhi hai waise.
Customer: Fir bhi inquiry toh aayegi na.
Executive: Ek ek minute sir.
Executive: Ye aapne product laga rakha hai Makrana white marble slab. Isme Makrana white marble ki lead lagi hui hai. Haan. Toh isko hata du ya rakhu?
Customer: Kyu?
Executive: Matlab aap bol rahe ho na Makrana ki nahi chahiye aapko.
Customer: Haan. Nahi toh wo toh hum dene wale hai na. Wo toh hum denge.
Executive: Aapne category lagayi hai Makrana white marble, theek hai? Toh aapke paas leads jo aayengi wo Makrana white marble ki aayengi.
Customer: Nahi Makrana white marble ki toh chahiye. Makrana ki matlab local ki wo buyleads nahi chahiye. Haan wo baat hai.
Executive: Local ki nahi chahiye. Haan wo. Okay.
Customer: Aise toh koi sa bhi marble chalega.
Executive: Okay. Baki abhi tak aapne jaise koi mandir, illes ya jaali ya pillar wagera kisi ka order abhi liya hai palki type wagera?
Customer: Abhi toh nahi hua hai.
Executive: Offline mein koi chal rahi hai kahi pe site?
Customer: Offline mein toh chalta hi hai. Ye aapki wali site se toh abhi tak kuch nahi mila. Aur lead bhi achi nahi aa rahi abhi tak toh mujhe.
Executive: Accha, matlab aisa hota hai ki baat hoti hai, baat ban nahi paati ya matlab?
Customer: Aapko keh raha hu na 70% toh ye bol rahe hai chahiye hi nahi wo matlab lead hi bekar ho gayi hamari. Theek hai. Negotiate kaise kare hum phir isko.
Executive: Negotiate matlab paiso pe problem aa rahi hai, paiso ki baat.
Customer: Nahi nahi. Hmm. Agar kaise kare. Wo lega jab hum usko de sakte hai na. Usko reverse. Haan haan matlab wo pehle hi directly mana kar rahe hai ki unko nahi bhi chahiye. Wo baat aa rahi hai.
Executive: Okay. Toh kya kare?
Executive: Toh aur baki jo 30% jo bol rahe hai ki unhe chahiye waha kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Waha pe matlab wohi competition hai. Aur kuch nahi.
Executive: Accha, okay.
Customer: Wo toh rate ke hisab se hi hota hai kaam aapko bataya na.
Executive: Ji sir. August mein liya tha aapne services ko. August 2025 mein liya tha.
Customer: Haan. August, September. August, September, October. Fourth month chal raha hai aapka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay. Main karwao buyleads ka kuch.
Executive: Okay. Sir dekho calls toh aapko nahi aaya hai koi bhi is mahine mein pichle mahine mein. Call nahi aa rahi aapko direct koi. Wo bhi nahi aa raha.
Customer: Haan. Aapki listing bhi down hai. Baki logo ke. Kya?
Executive: Listing bhi aapki down hai na. Kyu?
Executive: Matlab jaise man lijiye Amazon pe maine koi shirt search ki toh usme hota hai na koi shirt upar dikh rahi hai koi shirt niche toh aise bata rahi hu aapki company ka name. Haan. Samajh gaya wo toh main. Dikha raha hai thoda. Waise waise hamare direct calls utne nahi aa pa rahe hai. Aa hi nahi rahe hai actually. Haan toh wo uska kya karna hai solution aap batao.
Executive: Sir dekho buyleads toh hamari same rehti hai sirf buyleads balance mein difference aata hai jaise abhi hum 17 kar sakte hai week ki. Haan. Fir hum aapke ki 34 kar sakte hai. Bas direct calls aur inquiries toh sir visibility badhane se badhti hai aur. Maza nahi aa raha. Package bada ke kare isme bhi maza nahi aa raha. Wahi main wahi main bol rahi hu ke wahi hai na ki main aapko wo bol nahi sakti wo aapki marzi hai. Aapko lag raha hai ki isme nahi mil raha toh shayad usme mil jaye. Matlab kisi kisi ko lagta hai na isme nahi mil raha toh usme bhi nahi milega. Kisi kisi ko lagta hai isme nahi mil raha shayad isme mil jaye toh dono soch wale log hote hai. Yes sir. Nahi wo toh aap sahi hai par agar isme thoda koi profit rahe toh. Kyuki hum actually aapne pehle bhi complaint ki hai tab bhi humne wait kiya tha category wagera change karke. Theek hai but koi aapko difference change nahi feel hua hai I think uske baad bhi matlab paisa kaam karne ka. Main bas me karke bol raha hu mere ko. Hmm. Aur leads thodi iski kardo bas yahi dena chahta hu. Sir dekhiye leads ka sir actually kya hai na yaha pe matlab system AI generated hai matlab sab automatically aapke paas aa raha hai. Aise matlab mujhe nahi pata kis waqt konsi lead aapke paas portal pe dikhegi. Aur bahut sari aapne past leads check ki aapne kabhi? Jaise September pe kabhi gaye ho laptop wagera pe toh kuch leads hai jaise ki jo sold out ho chuki hai. Haan. Unko kabhi I am interested mark karke dekha hai? Kar liya madam usme bhi. Aur past leads mein jaake I am interested mark kiya hai leads ko jaise ki haan ye lead aapko sold out ho gayi aap nahi le paaye. Haan wo wo jo uska quantity thi wo wo logo ne le li toh I am interested wo uska option aata hai. Hmm. Toh usse kuch fayda hua? Nahi hua. Abhi jaise teen minute pehle Indore Madhya Pradesh se lead aayi thi marble wall fountain ki ek piece ki. Jo ki sold out ho gayi hai. Teen minute mein. Abhi? Hmm. Kitni der pehle? Teen minute pehle bata toh rahi hu. Aap khud check kar sakte ho ki hum baat kar rahe the. Nahi nahi kar lunga abhi toh main aapse baat kar wo baat hai. Ji ji. Maine just abhi open kiya tha toh maine kaha hum baat kar rahe the utni der mein ek lead sold out ho gayi. Toh kuch achi leads aa bhi rahi hongi toh wo sold out ho ja rahi hongi. Ye problem aa rahi hogi. Aisa ho sakta hai. Sir dekh lijiye thoda uh one week aur wait kar lijiye agar change lagta hai toh theek hai warna bataiyega agar aap upgrade karane ka plan kar rahe ho toh. Theek hai madam theek hai. Ji sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good quality buyleads.

- 70% of leads are not relevant.

- 30% of leads are already taken.

- Inquiries are mostly from Makrana only.

- Listing is down compared to competitors.

- No direct calls are being received.



Resolution:

- Executive explained that the system is AI-generated.

- Executive suggested checking past leads and marking interest.

- Executive suggested waiting a week to see if changes occur.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will wait one week to see changes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, makrana, listing, ai, sold out
